item.title: Help please
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

Im trying to load a text file full of object names and their id. This is how it looks (including spaces):

" 1 Crate "

public static void loadObjectNames() { try { Scanner s = new Scanner(new File("./data/objectsSimple.txt")); while (s.hasNextLine()) { String[] line = s.nextLine().split(" "); objectNames[Integer.parseInt(line[0])] = Integer.parseInteger(line[1]); } System.out.println("Loaded " + objectNames.length + " object names"); } catch (IOException e) { e.printStackTrace(); } }

I am wondering how to change that red bit to make it look for and save the stringâ€¦
